c74object.name: mb.fmcloud~
c74object.digest: A granular cloud generator created using grains of FM synthesis timbres

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event. This instrument is not truely polyphonic, but rather will select active notes by chance.

method.name: freqRatio
method.digest: The ratio of the modulating frequency to the carrier

method.name: freqRatioRand
method.digest: A random amount added to the freqRatio on each grain

method.name: timbreVar
method.digest: Locks the freqRatioRand to different divisions of 1. 0% will result in only integer values being generates as where 100% will not have any rounding.

method.name: modIndex
method.digest: The modulation depth determined by a ratio of the modulation frequency.

method.name: modIndex
method.digest: A random value added to the modIndex for each grain.

method.name: pitchRand
method.digest: A random amount of semitones (+/-) added to individual grains

method.name: overlap
method.digest: The number of grains that will sound at the same time. Effects the grain size in relation to the grain rate.

method.name: envelope
method.digest: Determines the grain envelope either via a list of points (x,y,c) or by a preset (name-of-preset). Lists of points are in the format x1 y1 c1 ... xn yn cn where x and y are positions from 0-1 and c is a curve factor from -1 to 1 where 0 is linear.
